name: Craig SAUNDERS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondents

parties: Craig SAUNDERS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of August, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
955 A.2d 344
Craig SAUNDERS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 13, 2008.
